snippet: President Obama has cited the fact that the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett pays less of his income in taxes than his secretary as an egregious example of an unjust tax code.
abstract: Pres Obama's tax returns show that he and wife Michelle paid just over 20 percent of their gross income in federal taxes, a rate slightly lower than that of Obama's secretary Anita Decker Breckenridge; Obama has cited the fact that billionaire Warren E Buffet pays a lower tax rate than his secretary as an egregious example of an unjust tax code.
lead_paragraph: President Obama has cited the fact that the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett pays less of his income in taxes than his secretary as an egregious example of an unjust tax code.

headline.main: Obama, Like Buffett, Had Lower Tax Rate Than His Secretary
headline.print_headline: Obama, Like Buffett, Had Lower Tax Rate Than His Secretary
